trans-unit.source: The CASE expression can be used for conditional expressions in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: The CASE expression can be used for conditional expressions in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: The CASE expression can be used for conditional expressions in <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: You can place a CASE expression anywhere an expression is allowed. It chooses an expression to evaluate based on a boolean test.

seg-source.mrk: You can place a CASE expression anywhere an expression is allowed.
It chooses an expression to evaluate based on a boolean test.

target.mrk: You can place a CASE expression anywhere an expression is allowed.
It chooses an expression to evaluate based on a boolean test.

trans-unit.source: CASE WHEN booleanExpression THEN thenExpression [ WHEN booleanExpression THEN thenExpression ]* ELSE elseExpression END

seg-source.mrk: CASE WHEN booleanExpression THEN thenExpression [ WHEN booleanExpression THEN thenExpression ]* ELSE elseExpression END

target.mrk: CASE WHEN booleanExpression THEN thenExpression [ WHEN booleanExpression THEN thenExpression ]* ELSE elseExpression END

trans-unit.source: The thenExpression and elseExpression are both expressions that must be type-compatible. For built-in types, this means that the types must be the same or that a built-in broadening conversion must exist between the types.

seg-source.mrk: The thenExpression and elseExpression are both expressions that must be type-compatible.
For built-in types, this means that the types must be the same or that a built-in broadening conversion must exist between the types.

target.mrk: The thenExpression and elseExpression are both expressions that must be type-compatible.
For built-in types, this means that the types must be the same or that a built-in broadening conversion must exist between the types.

trans-unit.source: -- returns 3 VALUES CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN 3 ELSE 4 END -- returns 7 VALUES CASE WHEN 1 = 2 THEN 3 WHEN 4 = 5 THEN 6 ELSE 7 END

seg-source.mrk: -- returns 3 VALUES CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN 3 ELSE 4 END -- returns 7 VALUES CASE WHEN 1 = 2 THEN 3 WHEN 4 = 5 THEN 6 ELSE 7 END

target.mrk: -- returns 3 VALUES CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN 3 ELSE 4 END -- returns 7 VALUES CASE WHEN 1 = 2 THEN 3 WHEN 4 = 5 THEN 6 ELSE 7 END
